item.title: Gold Jumps To All-Time Highs – Veteran trader Peter Brandt Says $8,000 An Ounce Is On The Cards
item.description: Spot gold (XAU/USD) powered past $4,800 an ounce for the first time, rising as much as 2.6% to $4,888.5 per ounce.

item.title: Why Is OKLO Stock Rising Pre-Market Today?
item.description: BofA upgraded the nuclear startup to ‘Buy’, citing its deal with Meta to power AI data centers.
